#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

bool isPowerOfTwo(long long x){
	return ((x!=0) && !(x & (x-1)));
}

int main(){
	int n;
	scanf("%d", &n);

	int height[n], dp[n];
	for(int i=0 ; i<n ; i++){
		scanf("%lld", &height[i]);
		dp[i] = -1;
	}

	dp[0] = 0;
	int energy, diff;
	for(int i=0 ; i<n ; i++){
		for(int j=1 ; i+j<n ; j*=2){
			if(dp[i+j] == -1){
				dp[i+j] = dp[i] + abs(height[i] - height[i+j]);
			} else {
				dp[i+j] = min(dp[i+j], dp[i] + abs(height[i] - height[i+j]));
			}
		}
	}

	cout<<dp[n-1]<<endl;

	return 0;	
}
